Verbesserung der Qualität, Verfügbarkeit und Effektivität des jemenitischen Gesundheitssystems durch Steigerung der personellen Kapazitäten sowie Ausbau der Infrastruktur
Yemen HRP 	SYHS	Health	"SYHS aims to improve the Yemeni health care system's quality, availability, and effectiveness by increasing personnel capacities and expanding the infrastructure. The project focuses on enabling the reproductive health components to function in the facilities by providing equipment and tailored curricula. The project primarily aims to strengthen the health system, especially reproductive health; this strengthens the rights of women, which promotes gender equality.
---- BMZ

The primary aim of the project is to better protect endangered Rohingya families in the Kutupalong refugee camp and families from the nearby host community from natural disasters, from dangers to public health (COVID 19), from gender-based violence and domestic violence.
Adolescents and young adults, especially girls and young women, are agents of change and contribute to a protective environment through improved skills and opportunities.
The goal of the IA is to identify, promote and scale new, innovative ideas and approaches for a world without hunger.

meta.message: As the boundary only has years as its parameter, the calculated total "incoming" funding has been modified to specially include certain flows which are marked as internal to this boundary. This is because there will be many donor contributions made within the same year as the boundary, which should logically be included in the calculation of total incoming funding to the year.
